conversations.body_text: Hi Cameron Daw,    We apologize for not updating your shipping notification in a timely manner. Your logistics information has now been updated.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047211077470

It's all good, I thought the order got cancelled, it's nothing on your side
as far as I can work out, it must of been something with the shipping


On Thu, 8 Jan 2026, 9:02 pm service@simsonn.com,
